name: Trial (krrjuus)
description:
Theme: Death is only the beginning

***********************

Can you beat the poison running through your veins?

Venture yourself into the dungeons to find the cure to your illness before you die.

Find the three different tools that will aid you in your quest.

Defeat anything that comes into your way.

Be judged when your time comes.

***********************

It's the first time I actually finish a game (a 2 minutes long game lol)

I developed it myself in the last 2 days, so there is no audio and it needs a lot of polishing, but I learned a lot on the way.

Hope you enjoy it.
p.s. there are 2 different endings!
